author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
This PR fixes a potential race condition in the HLT digi morphing implementation by introducing a 2-buffer system for storing pixel status flags. It also includes other fixes and optimizations in the algorithm.

 **2-Buffer Scheme**

  The pixel status is encoded using two buffers (image and temp), with 1 bit per pixel:
 | image | temp | status |
  |:-----:|:----:|--------|
  | 0 | 0 | empty |
  | 1 | 0 | true pixel |
  | 0 | 1 | fake pixel (after expansion) |
  | 1 | 1 | duplicate |

**Notes:**
A separate PR with the monitoring of fake and duplicate pixels will follow
